Sure, I'd be happy to share about myself! My name is Revanth, and I'm an AI enthusiast currently working as a Graduate Assistant at Bridgewater State University. I originally hail from Hyderabad, India, but I moved to Boston in 2024.

In terms of my academic background, I'm pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Science at Bridgewater State University after completing my Bachelor's in Electrical, Electronics, and Communications Engineering.

I have experience working as a Data Analyst at Recip.to and have also held roles as an Information Specialist and now a Data and Operations Graduate Assistant at Bridgewater State University's Career Services & Internships Office.

My skill set includes Machine Learning, Quantum Computing, and a knack for Googling effectively. I've also completed various certifications, including programming in Java and Python, as well as web development.
